name: NATIONAL INTERSCHOLASTIC ATHLETIC ADMINISTRATORS ASSOCIATION (NIAAA)
sampleDescriptions: Supporting a resolution recognition for interscholastic athletic administrators

Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day resolution (HRes 1212/SRes 778); PPE for Safe Schools Act (HR 8664) - adding athletic administrator eligibility for tax credit; STARTS Act (HR 8418) - to i
Expanding tax code to allow athletic administrators and coaches to access the same tax deductions as teachers
Expanding tax code to allow athletic administrators and coaches to access the same tax deductions as teachers, including soliciting cosponsors for HR 3427
